Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Authorizes certain former full-time police officers to be eligible to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer
Summary: Authorizes former full-time police officers with the New York city police department to be eligible to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer and contingent on their score, to be placed on the eligible list for appointment as a full-time police officer for the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing certain former full-time police officers to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer for the city of New York
